data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Tottenham.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Burnley.
At Turf Moor, Josh Brownhill has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Harry Kane for Tottenham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Tottenham.
In the minute 6, In Burnley Burnley's Ashley Barnes is caught offside.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
Throw-in for Burnley at Turf Moor.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ben Davies for the away team is judged to be offside.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Toby Alderweireld is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ashley Barnes of Burnley gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
In the minute 15, Toby Alderweireld for Tottenham is back on the field again.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards Burnley a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick Burnley.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Michael Oliver blows against Burnley's Ashley Barnes for offside.
In the minute 20, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Burnley.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Michael Oliver signals a Tottenham throw-in in Burnley's half.
In the minute 25, Burnley have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Ashley Barnes for Burnley is whistled offside.
In the minute 30, Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Tottenham, close to Burnley's area.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Burnley's half?
Tanguy Ndombele (Tottenham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Can Burnley capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Burnley Burnley attack through Josh Brownhill. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 36, Tottenham have a goal kick.
Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Burnley's Ashley Westwood gets in a shot on goal at Turf Moor. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Tottenham at Turf Moor.
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 45, Johann Gudmundsson of Burnley smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Burnley's Johann Gudmundsson breaks free at Turf Moor. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Tottenham push forward at Turf Moor and Harry Kane gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Burnley defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Tottenham in Burnley.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Turf Moor.
Michael Oliver signals a Tottenham throw-in in Burnley's half.
In the minute 47, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Throw-in Burnley.
Burnley's Josh Brownhill misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 50, Michael Oliver awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Burnley.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Burnley's Chris Wood is whistled for offside at Turf Moor.
Tottenham's Harry Kane is whistled for offside at Turf Moor.
In the minute 56, Ashley Barnes (Burnley) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
James Tarkowski's header is off-target for Burnley.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Tottenham goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
The away team have replaced Lucas Moura with Erik Lamela. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
In the minute 58, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Throw-in for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Ball safe as Tottenham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Burnley's Ashley Westwood gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Burnley to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
In the minute 67, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Burnley's Chris Wood is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 69, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Tottenham in their own half.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 72, Burnley drive upfield and Chris Wood gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tottenham defender.
Tottenham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Burnley throw-in in Tottenham's half.
In the minute 73, Chris Wood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Burnley.
Michael Oliver awards Burnley a goal kick.
Heung Min Son (Tottenham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 75, Harry Kane (Tottenham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Goal! Tottenham have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Heung Min Son.
In the minute 76, Harry Kane with an assist there.
Tottenham have a goal kick.
Tottenham make their second substitution with Giovani Lo Celso replacing Tanguy Ndombele.
In the minute 80, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tottenham close to the penalty box.
Burnley's Kevin Long has been booked in Burnley.
Giovani Lo Celso (Tottenham) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 81, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tottenham have a dangerous throw-in.
Tottenham pushes forward through Erik Lamela, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sean Dyche (Burnley) is making a first substitution, with Jay Rodriguez replacing Johann Gudmundsson.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 85, Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Matej Vydra is replacing Ashley Barnes for the home team.
Throw-in Burnley.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Dwight McNeil has recovered and rejoins the match in Burnley.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Tottenham.
Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Important block from the Tottenham defence as Chris Wood fires in a strike for Burnley.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Attention is being given to Burnley’s Dwight McNeil and play has been suspended briefly.
Jose Mourinho is making the team's third substitution at Turf Moor with Joe Rodon replacing Heung Min Son.
